ai-mil7.7.2:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what is the definite of this?”
ai-mil7.7.2:1.2_0: “Great king, if aheaded thunder, a sword, smears on the hand,
ai-mil7.7.2:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, the one who practices like a teacher, employed each with a Dhamma talk, he should honor, respect, esteem, and venerate all the good friendship.
ai-mil7.7.2:1.4_0: “This is the breasts of that one thing, great king.
ai-mil7.7.2:1.5_0: The Buddha has spoken about the Dīgha Tāvatiṁsa devas when he alive
ai-mil7.7.2:2.1_0: ‘Please, Ānanda, feed the heartwood on the tip of the heartwood. Staying youth, he is diligent, keen, and resolute.’”
ai-mil7.7.2:3.1_0: The second enquiry (called) the second enquiry.
